events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer role and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department for further consideration and technical evaluation.
A dedicated recruiter specializing in software engineering has been assigned to handle your application and guide you through the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background, technical skills, and motivation for the software developer position.
Thank you for promptly providing detailed answers during our screening; your enthusiasm for software engineering is clearly evident.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our lead developer for 2024-05-07 at 14:00 UTC to assess your coding and problem-solving skills.
